/* Homosexual affair and methamphetamine allegations */Why would an unlinked name be preferable to a linked name with some context?? Think about your decisions here, please.
/* Sexual and methamphetamine allegations */ We should be more specific? Sexual is too vague.
/* Sexual and methamphetamine allegations */ Why would someone say "a male escort" when the guy has already been named just above??
/* Sexual and methamphetamine allegations */ "That day" unclear in context
/* Homosexuality and methamphetamine allegations */ Can we please stick to the facts? He's being accused of sex wtih a man, not homosexuality, which is exclusive same-sex orientation

/* Books */ needs wikified with publishers, ISBN, date
/* Early life and conversion */ Gay "lifestyles" is a POV term, as meaningless as "heterosexual lifestyles." Fact please for this "most vociferous" claim. In the country? Among pastors?
/* Early Life and Conversion */ Why do people insist on capitalizing in headers despite the longstanding Wikipedia policy against it? It's so bizzare
